caption: A plane is flying through a heavily clouded sky, shaking violently. A girl wakes up to find herself staggering around, realizing that everyone else on the plane has fainted. She helplessly wanders through the plane's aisle. The scene shifts to an opening sequence showcasing a city. We then see a man watching a movie in a theater. Suddenly, the lights go out, and noises can be heard. The man becomes very frightened. He looks around and runs out, noticing someone chasing him. The portraits around him have been altered, all dripping with fresh blood. He is terrified and runs into a house, only to find the door won't open. Another man enters the scene. The terrified man pleads for help, but the newcomer simply snaps his fingers, and the lights behind them turn on.
